prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a unique spoon weapon and a yellow fur coat.
Imagine a Pokemon with a humanoid shape and a mischievous personality, wielding a spoon.
Generate a bipedal creature with psychic powers and a playful demeanor, set in an urban environment.
Make a Pokemon with a distinctly yellow body and a sage-like appearance, using its abilities in combat.
Show me a Pokemon known for its psychic abilities, characterized by its sleek body and sharp features.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in forest habitats, with a striking color palette of yellow and brown.
Give me a Pokemon that evolves from a basic form and has a notable affinity for mind tricks.
